message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - io.fabric8.kubernetes.api.model.*.

All overloaded methods should be placed next to each other. Placing non-overloaded methods in between overloaded methods with the same type is a violation. Previous overloaded method located at line '482'.

All overloaded methods should be placed next to each other. Placing non-overloaded methods in between overloaded methods with the same type is a violation. Previous overloaded method located at line '1,226'.
